description.english: Kill the first villager you encounter.
description.german: Töte den ersten Dorfbewohner, der dir begegnet.
description.french: Tuez le premier villageois que vous rencontrez.
description.spanish: Mata al primer aldeano que encuentres.
description.brazilian: Mate o primeiro aldeão que encontrar.
description.schinese: 杀死你遇到的第一个村民。

description.english: Spare the first villager you encounter.
description.german: Verschone den ersten Dorfbewohner, der dir begegnet.
description.french: Épargnez le premier villageois que vous rencontrez.
description.spanish: Deja con vida al primer aldeano que encuentres.
description.brazilian: Poupe o primeiro aldeão que encontrar.
description.schinese: 放过你遇到的第一个村民。

description.english: Complete the quest “From Ashes We Rise.”
description.german: Schließe die Quest "Auferstanden aus Asche" ab.
description.french: Terminez la quête "De nos cendres nous renaissons".
description.spanish: Completa la misión "Nos alzamos de las cenizas".
description.schinese: 完成任务"于灰烬中重生"

displayName.french: La route se poursuit sans fin

description.german: Schließe die Einführung des Spiels ab.
description.schinese: 完成游戏的新手教学部分。
与瑞薇卡达成盟友关系。
与克蕾塔达成盟友关系。
与马拉克达成盟友关系。

displayName.spanish: El señor de la sangre se alza

description.english: Complete the entire story arc available in Early Access.
description.german: Schließe die gesamte im Early Access verfügbare Geschichte ab.
description.polish: Ukończ cały wątek fabularny dostępny w Early Access.
description.french: Terminez l'intégralité de la quête principale disponible dans la version en accès anticipé.
description.spanish: Completa el arco completo de la historia en acceso anticipado.
description.brazilian: Conclua o arco da história disponível no Acesso Antecipado.
description.schinese: 完成游戏抢先体验版本的全部故事主线任务。
description.ukrainian: Завершити всю сюжетну лінію, доступну в ранньому доступі.
description.russian: Пройти всю сюжетную линию, доступную в раннем доступе.

displayName.french: Un château digne d'un seigneur du sang
displayName.spanish: Castillo de señor de la sangre

description.spanish: Ten a 3 sirvientes vampiros a tus órdenes.
Ten a 7 sirvientes vampiros a tus órdenes.
Ten a 12 sirvientes vampiros a tus órdenes.

displayName.french: Des serviteurs à perte de vue

description.spanish: Ten a 20 sirvientes vampiros a tus órdenes.

description.english: Equip a Vampire Servant with an outfit and a tool.
description.german: Rüste einen Vampir-Diener mit Kleidung und Werkzeug aus.
description.polish: Wyposaż Wampirzego Sługę w strój i narzędzie.
description.french: Équipez un serviteur vampire d'une tenue et d'un outil.
description.spanish: Equipa a un sirviente vampiro con un atuendo y una herramienta.
description.brazilian: Equipe um Servo Vampiro com um traje e uma ferramenta.
description.turkish: Bir Vampir Hizmetkârına kıyafet ve alet ver.
description.schinese: 为一名吸血鬼仆从装备衣物以及工具。

description.english: Rebuild the Stronghold in Hell’s Chasm.
description.german: Baue die Festung im Höllenschlund wieder auf.
description.french: Reconstruisez la forteresse dans le Gouffre infernal.
description.spanish: Reconstruye la fortaleza de Abismo del Infierno.
description.brazilian: Reconstrua a Fortaleza no Abismo do Inferno.
description.turkish: Cehennem Kanyonu'ndaki şatoyu yeniden inşa et.
description.schinese: 重建地狱裂口区域的要塞。

displayName.english: Lord of the Grove of Sorrows
displayName.spanish: Señor de la Arboleda de los Pesares

description.english: Rebuild the Stronghold in the Grove of Sorrows.
description.german: Baue die Festung im Hain des Jammers wieder auf.
description.french: Reconstruisez la forteresse dans le Bosquet des chagrins.
description.spanish: Reconstruye la fortaleza de la Arboleda de los Pesares.
description.brazilian: Reconstrua a Fortaleza no Bosque dos Lamentos.
description.turkish: Matem Korusu'ndaki şatoyu yeniden inşa et.

description.english: Rebuild the Stronghold in the Fey Marshes.

description.turkish: Puslu Bataklık'ndaki şatoyu yeniden inşa et.

description.english: Rebuild the Strongholds in all lands.
description.german: Baue alle Festungen in allen Ländern wieder auf.
description.french: Reconstruisez les forteresses dans toutes les régions.
description.spanish: Reconstruye las fortalezas de todas las tierras.
description.brazilian: Reconstrua as Fortalezas em todas as regiões.
description.turkish: Bütün diyarlardaki şatoları yeniden inşa et.
description.schinese: 重建所有领土区域的要塞。

description.english: Unlock all Wings of Night upgrades in the Arcane tree.
description.german: Schalte alle Schwingen der Nacht-Upgrades im Arkana-Baum frei.
description.polish: Wykup wszystkie rozwinięcia Skrzydeł Nocy w drzewie Arkan.

description.spanish: Desbloquea todas las mejoras de Alas de la noche en el árbol arcano.

description.russian: Разблокировать все улучшения Крыльев ночи на дереве Арканов.

displayName.english: Now You See Me, Now You Don’t!
displayName.french: On me voit... on ne me voit plus !

displayName.polish: Teraz mnie widzisz, a teraz nie!
displayName.ukrainian: Секунду тому ви мене бачили, а тепер ні!
